response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's valued at $12,000 by you, which makes it an invaluable asset. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $10,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in its ability to meet your needs and expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 10000}
